Text:
So this is really the original Cantonese version?

I'm confused why all other Bluray releases so far are dubbed in Mandarin.

Thanks Ltt_01, very much appriciated! 

I´m not going to write seed, seed, seed like many guys are.

But...

...Please do not jump off the torrent as soon as you´r done guys.  Especially now when there is basicly just uploader +1 seeding for 671 leechers. 

Many want this movie right now, we should all help them get it as soon as possible, don´t you agree?

Ok, just a moment ago there were 2 seeders, now there´s only the uploader, am I right?

Have that seeder already uploaded at least a 1.0 ratio pherhaps?  Just think this is strange, ever time I see seeders going up to moore than 1 it dissapears right away and now there´s even moore leechers.

Guys, do any of you know if there is a torrentclient out there that simply doesn´ care much for the leech pigs but indeed does favour the good seeders?

Is that possible?

If so, is there such a client out there?

The pigs that jump off every torrent when done doesn´t even deserve my shit in there filthy mouth, where it should belong.
Pherhaps only a couple of hours left now (if I´m lucky), after that I will help seed this movie untill reached moore than 1:0 ratio, that´s for sure!
This is NOT Cantonese version, just spent forever downloading this and it's a China Mandarin dub.

Thank you for posting but does not like the fact that this is the mandarin version posted as cantonese version.

Torrents of the mandarin version had been posted.
great job on wasting my bandwidth and fooling everybody with ur cantonese language in the info.. i wonder why u got a pink skull  u freakin noob
I enjoyed this movie, thanks for uploading.
